content.webTitle: Woman stabbed to death at Euston station

fields.headline: Woman stabbed to death at Euston station
fields.bodyText: A woman has been stabbed to death and another man is fighting for his life after being attacked in Euston tube station. According to British Transport police, a woman was stabbed by a man following an argument which took place on the northbound platform of the Northern Line at around 6.30pm this evening. A male passenger who tried to intervene was also stabbed. According to witnesses, the attacker then ran up into the passenger hall and attempted to slit his own throat. The passenger hall was packed with commuters who ran for their lives. Ambulances were on the scene almost immediately, and both men were taken to nearby University College Hospital where they are now fighting for their lives.
